attributes.action: The Mayor of London should not also be the Police and Crime Commissioner.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that otherwise such a dual appointment has potential to be a conflict of interest.
attributes.background: Parliament should rule for Police and Crime Commissioners that are independent of political appointments.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Create a new, separate role of Police and Crime Commissioner for London 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729259
